# Invitation Web App

This is a full-stack Angular 20 application for creating custom invitation web apps.

## Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: Angular 20 with standalone components, Angular Material
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express.js
- **Database**: MongoDB with Mongoose ODM
- **Authentication**: JWT-based authentication

## Project Structure

```bash
invitation-webapp/
├── frontend/          # Angular 20 application
├── backend/           # Node.js/Express API
└── .github/           # GitHub configuration
```

## Features

- Create and customize invitations
- Guest management
- RSVP tracking
- Admin dashboard
- Multiple invitation themes
- Responsive design
